name: VAMPIRE SPAWN
size_type_alignment: Medium or Small Undead, Neutral Evil

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.text: The vampire has these weaknesses: Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

traits.name: Running Water
traits.text: The vampire takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

traits.name: Stake to the Heart
traits.text: The vampire is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Sunlight
traits.text: The vampire takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and uses Bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. Failure: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

bonus_actions.name: Deathless Agility
bonus_actions.text: The vampire takes the Dash or Disengage action.
